message.raw:
Bug in pairing function insde Helpers.cc

James Cowgill was kind enough to investigate the problems
in Debian for non x64 archictectures and come up with a patch.

See https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=888220#10 for
all the information.
